com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.table.sync

Class MobileServiceSyncContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.table.sync.MobileServiceSyncContext

  • public class MobileServiceSyncContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a way to synchronize local database with remote database.
